attributes.action: Pressure the Premier League to abandon plans for a 39th overseas game
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The English premier league has announced plans for the possible introduction of a 39th game of the season to be played overseas. This is taking the game away from the local fans and community where the heart of the game is/was/should be

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
